content.rendered:
How to slow down in a fast-moving world

Slow down in Kerala.

This is where life flows in slow motion. This is where the morning tea is a metre long. This is where healing is perfected by age-old rituals. This is where food tastes divine over a slow flame. This is where you can perfect the art of slowing down and catch up with yourself.
